::Hot Rod::

He takes hold of MM's punching arm, then rolls onto his back. Sticking
his legs into MM's gut, and pulling on his arms, he should be able to
flip MM onto his back on the ground.
"Well not being evil and hated by the whole galaxy help in living ya
know."
